title: No music in the login screen
body: Hi. Ever since the Galio rework my login screen doesn't play any music anymore. This is a small detail of course, but it would be nice to be able to listen to the amazing soundtrack you guys make. Please give me instructions on what to do in order to fix this bug.

replies.body: It works now. Thank you very much!

You might have the option in the client settings disabled as well. Click on the gear icon in the upper right, then click on sound on the left-hand side, and make sure that Enable Sounds is turned on. 

https://i.gyazo.com/32f196464f172d03694f0193c9aeaf49.png

Yes i did check but it's faded and it doesn't allow me to click it. Is there anything that I can do about this?
http://imgur.com/T2leZ5Q

I dunno if you tried this yet but there should be a box in the bottom corner (forgot which side) which says disable music and disable animations. Double check if you accidentally checked the box which says disabled music.
